General.Name: Companhia Energética do Rio Grande do Norte - COSERN
General.Description: Companhia Energética do Rio Grande do Norte " COSERN engages in the distribution and transmission of electricity in Rio Grande do Norte. It serves 167 municipalities in Rio Grande do Norte covering total area of 52,811 square kilometers. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Natal, Brazil. Companhia Energética do Rio Grande do Norte " COSERN is a subsidiary of Neoenergia S.A.
